snippet.title: O.R.B. Offensive Rolling Bot - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Officail trailer for O.R.B. Offensive Rolling Bot, developed by Karva Games for PC.

Demo available on itch.io and Game Jolt!
https://karvagames.itch.io/orb-offensive-rolling-bot
https://gamejolt.com/games/orb/392826

Follow Us On Social!
https://www.facebook.com/orbthegame/ 
https://twitter.com/karva_games
https://www.instagram.com/karvagames



O.R.B. is a 2D action platformer, where you play as a robot that can transform into a ball. By using these two forms, you must shoot and roll and bounce your way to victory, in order to defeat DiOS, the evil A.I.
